text:
Bayard Street, east from Lorimer Street. At the left when completed, will be Mc Carren Park.
September 10, 1935
P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Lorimer Street, east side, north from Bayard Street, to Driggs Ave.
Also seen is Driggs Ave., north side, east from Lorimer Street. At the right is a part of Mc Carren Park.
September 10, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, a more extensive view, showing Bayard Street in the foreground.
September 10, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Lorimer Street, east side, north from Bayard Street, to Driggs Ave.
Also seen is Driggs Ave., north side, east from Lorimer Street. At the right is a part of Mc Carren Park.
September 10, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, a more extensive view, showing Bayard Street in the foreground.
September 10, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

Brooklyn
McCarren Play Center, Lorimer St. n. of Bayard St.
P.L. Sperr
9-22-41
